Class DynamicStaggeredGridLayoutManager

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager
androidx.recyclerview.widget.StaggeredGridLayoutManager
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.widget.DynamicStaggeredGridLayoutManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.ScrollVectorProvider
public class DynamicStaggeredGridLayoutManager extends StaggeredGridLayoutManager
A StaggeredGridLayoutManager to fix RecyclerView issues.
